analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x6edbdeb48ccc0dfab0bbaebc349732e320d6d213.sol:
	Contract YesManCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x6edbdeb48ccc0dfab0bbaebc349732e320d6d213.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x6edbdeb48ccc0dfab0bbaebc349732e320d6d213.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/14/0x6edbdeb48ccc0dfab0bbaebc349732e320d6d213.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0x6edbdeb48ccc0dfab0bbaebc349732e320d6d213.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
